FuncDef:
The web-server url command configures the URL for redirecting in the HTTP-redirect-profile.
The undo web-server url command cancels the current configuration.
By default, no URL for redirecting in the HTTP-redirect-profile is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the URL address.
The value is a string ranging from 1 to 200.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The HTTP-redirection function is often used when the quotas of user or service is exhausted. The user's HTTP application will be redirected to a certain page, usually for adding funds.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
